thread.title: Sanders stresses gun control, calls for assault weapon ban
thread.title_full: Sanders stresses gun control, calls for assault weapon ban - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Nicholas Riccardi, Associated Press
title: Sanders stresses gun control, calls for assault weapon ban
text: Photo: Cliff Grassmick, AP Democratic presidential candidate Sen. Bernie Sanders of Vermont waves to the crowd as he arrives on the stage at the University of Colorado campus in Boulder, Colo., on Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015. (Cliff Grassmick/Daily Camera via AP) Democratic presidential candidate Sen. Bernie Sanders of Vermont... BOULDER, Colo. (AP) — Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders on Saturday called for an assault weapons ban in his second straight day of talking about an issue — guns — where he has sometimes deviated from the Democratic Party's consensus. Democratic presidential candidate Sen. Bernie Sanders of Vermont waves to the crowd as he arrives on the stage at the University of Colorado campus in Boulder, Colo., on Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015. (Cliff Grassmick/Daily Camera via AP) Democratic presidential candidate Sen. Bernie Sanders of Vermont... BOULDER, Colo. (AP) — Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders on Saturday called for an assault weapons ban in his second straight day of talking about an issue — guns — where he has sometimes deviated from the Democratic Party's consensus.
